name: Solar System (itch) (eezyboostgod)
description:
3D model of the Solar System. Not to scale.

Click on any planet, sun, moon, or comet to follow.

Modifications: Added the rest of the planets (Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune), changed the color of the comet tails, and adjusted the placement and FOV of the main camera to allow the player to see all planets while playing.

Credits:

Created by Horace Wan for Michigan State University's Game Design and Development course on Coursera taught by Brian Winn.
